title: Chaos at Etoile de Bessèges as Car Drives onto Race Route, Van Gils Forced to Abandon
content:
Race organizers have not yet commented on how the vehicle was able to enter the course with about 17km to go.

Read the full article at Chaos at Etoile de Bessèges as Car Drives onto Race Route, Van Gils Forced to Abandon on Velo.
author: ahood
